info.name: Something Awful Bookmarks Custom Colors
info.description:
Changes the colors of bookmarks to be slightly less Cheeto dust colored. It also replaces the tan star with a blue star. Now you don't need to complain to the admins about bookmark colors!

PM Terminal Entropy on the forums for any help or suggestions.
info.additionalInfo:
18th March 2013:
-OP highlighting changed to red, since blue is the seen post coloring and I didn't think it through the first time and red should stand out better.

Undated:
-OP highlight is now a brighter blue for seen and unseen posts.

Undated:
-Seen threads will now stand out more as light green.
